response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This extraordinary creation holds immense value for us, but I understand its worth might be subjective to you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $850,000. This opportunity is unique and tailored specifically for individuals like you who appreciate innovation and excellence. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this game-changing product into your possession.", "product_price": 850000}
